name: Silent Night (itch)
description:
Santa has to defend his house from zombie gnomes. Tower defense game. Try to get the best score. Made for Game Jam: https://itch.io/jam/bscotch2019

Controls:

Keyboard:
Arrow Keys - Move
Space - Place / pick up turret

Touch:
Drag to move in that direction
Tap to place / pick up turret

Controller (Xbox360-style):
Left Stick - Move
A - Place / Pick up turret

Play Silent Night online: https://silentnight-gamejam.web.app

Also check out https://couchgames.tv  to play games with friends on your couch
